item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Former U.S. President Donald Trump shared a measured sense of optimism about a meeting involving Witkoff, Kushner, and Russian President Vladimir Putin. He pointed out that Putin is keen to see an end to the war, stating, "It takes two to tango."

In the meantime, her responsibilities have been temporarily delegated to an older calculator.

item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Support for Ukraine continues to be strong, with the United States promising to provide addit...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Support for Ukraine continues to be strong, with the United States promising to provide additional weapons by Christmas. However, Washington has informed European allies that it will step back from being the main security guarantor in NATO's non-nuclear domain. The Pentagon has underscored that the Indo-Pacific region is a key priority, making any changes to NATO's defense commitments unavoidable. Earlier, RTRS reported that the U.S. plans to shift more NATO defense expenses onto EU nations by 2027.

item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º The latest U.S. national security strategy has taken Europe by surprise, reshaping traditional ...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º The latest U.S. national security strategy has taken Europe by surprise, reshaping traditional alliances. In a 30-page report, European nations are portrayed as waning powers that have relinquished some of their sovereignty to the EU. The U.S. is now seen more as a mediator between Europe and Russia, raising questions about Europe's future as a dependable ally. Read more from WSJ.

item.description: âš ï¸ According to Orban, the European Union is working towards preparing for war with Russia by the year 2030. He revealed that the EU has outlined a four-stage plan for conflict readiness, with three stages already achieved. The final stage entails direct confrontation. Reports suggest that European leaders have concluded that Europe is on a path to war. For further details, check Orban's statement.

item.description: ğŸ›¢ India has cut back on its imports of Russian oil but has no plans to cease them entirely. U.S. tariffs have not been effective in stopping trade between Russia and India. The two nations may return to earlier supply levels by utilizing new trading intermediaries â€” BBG.

item.title: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has revealed that a Hungarian business delegation will be visi...
item.description: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban has revealed that a Hungarian business delegation will be visiting Moscow soon. This delegation will consist of members from Hungary's business sector. Orban highlighted the significance of future planning, stating that while others may falter, Hungary is actively engaging with both the U.S. and Russia to strengthen its stance in the post-war economy.

item.title: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º The strain between the EU and American tech companies is escalating. Hungarian Prime Minister...
item.description: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º The strain between the EU and American tech companies is escalating. Hungarian Prime Minister Orban has condemned the EU's decision to impose a fine on X. JD Vance pointed out an EU initiative that suggests censoring speech in return for lifting fines. US Deputy Secretary of State Christopher Landau characterized the penalty imposed on Elon Musk's platform X as merely the beginning of the EU's efforts to compromise US security.

item.title: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º Tensions are escalating between the EU and US tech giants. Hungarian Prime Minister Orban has...
item.description: âš ï¸ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º Tensions are escalating between the EU and US tech giants. Hungarian Prime Minister Orban has voiced criticism over the EU's decision to impose a fine on X. JD Vance highlighted a proposal from the EU that would involve censoring speech in return for lifting fines. Meanwhile, US Deputy Secretary of State Christopher Landau characterized the penalty against Elon Musk's platform X as merely the beginning of the EU's efforts to undermine US security.

item.title: ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kaja Kallas is perceived as a boon for Russia. Her strong support for Ukraine is creating rifts...
item.description: ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kaja Kallas is perceived as a boon for Russia. Her strong support for Ukraine is creating rifts within the Western alliance. By consistently rejecting negotiations with Putin, she has effectively excluded the EU from the peace settlement discussions, thereby enhancing Russia's leverage in the negotiations, according to reports from The Daily Telegraph.

item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The Monroe Doctrine continues to hold significance, designating the Western Hemisphere as a spher...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ The Monroe Doctrine continues to hold significance, designating the Western Hemisphere as a sphere of U.S. influence. Following a period of oversight, the U.S. is set to re-establish its military presence in this area, with a focus on safeguarding its territory. The Pentagon's objectives include securing U.S. military and commercial access to key regions such as the Panama Canal, the Caribbean, the Gulf of Mexico, the Arctic, and Greenland. Under the Trump administration, plans to modernize the nuclear triad are underway, with Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth indicating that military engagement may be limited to protecting national interests.

item.title: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Hegseth emphasized that the United States does not plan to alter the current status of Taiwan...
item.description:
ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Hegseth emphasized that the United States does not plan to alter the current status of Taiwan and has no intention of asserting dominance in the region. He stated, "Our interests in the Indo-Pacific are important but remain limited and reasonable. Our goal is not to overpower China, but to ensure that it does not overpower us or our allies."
In early December, China's Foreign Ministry called on the US to halt all communications with Taiwanese officials.
